about_the_game:
One of set of each SP version card.

[INCLUDED]
- D-SS02/SP01 Sealed Blaze Dragon, Aaushniya
- D-SS02/SP02 Blaze Maiden, Amelia
- D-SS02/SP03 Desire Devil, Dofund
- D-SS02/SP04 Diabolos Madonna, Meagan
- D-SS02/SP05 Cardinal Dominus, Orfist Regis
- D-SS02/SP06 Aurora Battle Princess, Launcher Charleen
- D-SS02/SP07 Gravidia Peters
- D-SS02/SP08 Heavenly Command Dragon, Exalute Dragon
- D-SS02/SP09 Dead Sea Spiritualist, Grave゠Zorga
- D-SS02/SP10 Sylvan Horned Beast, Armadi
- D-SS02/SP11 Cure Flare Dracokid
- D-SS02/SP12 Brilliant Floral, Uania
- D-SS02/SP13 Whistling Arrow of Recursion, Obifold
- D-SS02/SP14 Heartiness Tear Sorceress
- D-SS02/SP15 Alchemic Hedgehog

**If you already own the maximum number of cards allowed in-game that are also included in this set, you will receive a worthy amount of CP (in-game material for card crafting) instead.
**This set is also included in the "Rare Card Set 01 - 09".
**It is possible to purchase both individual Rare Card Sets and the bundle, but the acquisition of SP cards will only be reflected once.
**Please be careful not to purchases a Rare Card Sets twice.
detailed_description:
One of set of each SP version card.

[INCLUDED]
- D-SS02/SP01 Sealed Blaze Dragon, Aaushniya
- D-SS02/SP02 Blaze Maiden, Amelia
- D-SS02/SP03 Desire Devil, Dofund

**If you already own the maximum number of cards allowed in-game that are also included in this set, you will receive a worthy amount of CP (in-game material for card crafting) instead.
**This set is also included in the "Rare Card Set 01 - 09".
**It is possible to purchase both individual Rare Card Sets and the bundle, but the acquisition of SP cards will only be reflected once.
**Please be careful not to purchases a Rare Card Sets twice.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
